subsections.title: Google
subsections.subtitle: Software Engineering Intern
description: Contributed to migration of email quarantine tool used by thousands of GSuite Gmail customers
Utilized internal microservices platform to add to backend service for Gmail tool (Java)
Committed 3000+ lines of Java code to Gmail codebase and read 6000+ lines of legacy Java code
Collaborated across three teams to determine optimal, modern design decisions in migration project

subsections.title: Google
subsections.subtitle: Engineering Practicum Intern
description: Designed and built debugging tool for team of 15 backend engineers on Google Drive (Java)
Implemented data pipeline to process billions of records using internal MapReduce framework
Worked with co-intern and team to determine design decisions and useful features

subsections.subtitle: Harvey Mudd Clinic Program
